root.name: Prize Fighter
root.description: The Game The game is played from the first person perspective and is comprised of nothing but video, except for a menu here and there. When the match starts your opponent will begin assaulting you and taunting you every know and then. The game is virtually impossible without the assistance of cues telling you when to punch and which punch to throw. You must learn each of the four rival boxers movements and learn when to strike. As The Kid, you have two arm cannons at your disposal, capable of hooks, jabs and the deadly uppercut. To win you need to knock out your opponent, you have three rounds to do so, with the health of you and your opponent in the bottom of the screen. In between matches you can allocate power points to your left arm, your right arm and your health. You cannot move more than half of your points to one selection, ruling out the possibility of overpowering your left arm and just throwing punches with it, or doing the same to your health and just out lasting your opponent.
